+
+// Test that the 'static bound from the Copy impl is respected. Regression test for #29149.
+
+#![feature(nll)]
+
+#[derive(Clone)] struct Foo<'a>(&'a u32);
+impl Copy for Foo<'static> {}
+
+fn main() {
+    let s = 2;
+    let a = Foo(&s); //~ ERROR `s` does not live long enough [E0597]
+    drop(a);
+    drop(a);
+}
